MatchedRegions.transcript: And after defining the causal model, we can use the neural network to estimate the treatment effects by learning conditional intensity function with maximizing likelihood.

MatchedRegions.transcript: But here we may face a challenge, which is that the covariance could be correlated with the treatment because the platforms like Twitter, like Reddit,

MatchedRegion.Text: A(t|H(TrUX)), p(f|H(TrUX),t), ((t|H(X)) p(f|H(X),t) p(Tr|H(X)) Intensity Feature Treatment Function Distribution Predictor GRL: adversarial H(Trux) H(X) training H (X) Share Encoder (H) (Y,TrUX) (Y, 0 UX) (Tr,X) Engage Post Post Engage Post

MatchedRegions.transcript: they will recommend you with the content that they believe you are very likely to click on.
So the covariate will be correlated with treatment.

MatchedRegions.transcript: So to solve this issue, we propose an adversarial balanced neural temporal point process that can remove such kind of correlation with theoretical guarantees.
